§bRight Click while riding for a temporary speed boost. Won't harm mounts unless durability is low. Hold Right Click in the water and your mount will swim with you riding!§r
tooltip.ridingutils.reins.tooltip.shift: §bRight Click any mob (well, most mobs) to ride. Hold Right Click while riding to move in that direction. Works on flying mobs! Mounts will swim with you riding!§r
